metadata.title: CVE-2018-12933 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: PlayEnhMetaFileRecord in enhmetafile.c in Wine 3.7 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) or possibly haveunspecified other impact because the attacker controls thepCreatePen->ihPen array index.

criterions.comment: wine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
